channel.title: Imperium42.com may be down temporarily over the next few days while we change servers
channel.description:
We want to change servers to support some cutting-edge features - we'll start with imperium42.com to be safe:
The website may be down or show a placeholder during this process. Some images may be broken, such as the forum image at the top-left hosted on imperium42.com
This shouldn't effect most people since https://www.ThroneOfLies.com should not be effected ~
